definition: to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall

sentences.english: The only shield to his memory is the rectitude and sincerity of his actions.
sentences.chinese: 在追憶往事時，唯一的盾牌是他的行爲正直和誠實。

sentences.english: Recalling the years flowing away as the music's slowly running.
sentences.chinese: 隨着音樂的緩緩流動，仿若追憶似水流年。

sentences.english: Nostalgia nostalgic old people things, like recalling the good old days.
sentences.chinese: 懷舊人老戀舊事，喜歡追憶過去的美好時光。

sentences.english: Here has become martyrs Remembrance of the past later pondered the historical sites.
sentences.chinese: 這裏已成爲後人憑弔先烈追憶往事的歷史遺址。

sentences.english: Was only the thing is the human must, in former times already felt frustrated, was unable to recall.
sentences.chinese: 只是物是人非，昔時已經惘惘，無法追憶。

sentences.english: In such reminiscences the night was spent.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的追憶往事中度過了這個夜晚。

sentences.english: For most of us, a stroll down Memory Lane is an easy trip.
sentences.chinese: 對於大多數人而言，追憶往事是一種簡單的旅行。

sentences.english: Looking back, I realize it was nothing but self-sabotage.
sentences.chinese: 追憶過去，我意識到那隻不過是自暴自棄罷了。

sentences.english: I tried hard to recollect what I saw just before the accident.
sentences.chinese: 我苦苦追憶着出事前見到的一切。

sentences.english: People who sent us the retrospection.
sentences.chinese: 追憶每一個給過我們記憶的人。

sentences.english: The following are some remembrances of Mr.
sentences.chinese: 下面是對他的部分追憶。

sentences.english: Disturbed the night to sing to sing the dim light the lower levels become out of my mind sad recollections.
sentences.chinese: 夜唱忐忑唱燈火闌珊下情已成追憶傷感出我的心聲。

sentences.english: This year book ekes out souvenir of my life in the university.
sentences.chinese: 這本年鑑幫助我追憶大學生活。

sentences.english: For most of us,a stroll down Memory Lane is an easy trip.
sentences.chinese: 對於大多數人而言，一個追憶往事是一種簡單的旅行。
追憶往事，使他的眼睛都亮了。

sentences.english: At this time of national celebration, we recollect and reflect.
sentences.chinese: 國慶之日是追憶與反思之日。

definition: to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
great changes/ups and downs/vicissitudes/abbr. of 滄海桑田|沧海桑田[cang1 hai3 sang1 tian2]
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
